subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pedro Martínez was back with the Mets on Friday, which meant he was throwing, smiling, joking and trying to bring some stability to a team that has been wobbly without him.
snippet: Pedro Martínez was back with the Mets on Friday, which meant he was throwing, smiling, joking and trying to bring some stability to a team that has been wobbly without him.
